definition: a delicate decorative fabric woven in an open web of symmetrical patterns, add alcohol to (beverages)
details:
noun
- a delicate decorative fabric woven in an open web of symmetrical patterns
- a cord that is drawn through eyelets or around hooks in order to draw together two edges (as of a shoe or garment)
= synonyms: lacing
verb
- add alcohol to (beverages)
= synonyms: spike, fortify
- spin,wind, or twist together
= synonyms: twine, intertwine, entwine, enlace, interlace
- draw through eyes or holes
= example: draw through eyes or holes
= synonyms: lace up
- do lacework
- make by braiding or interlacing
= example: make by braiding or interlacing
= synonyms: braid
